sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, View, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, useWindowDimensions, PixelRatio } from 'react-native'

export default function CreateRoomScreen() {

    const { width, height } = useWindowDimensions()
    const fontRatio = PixelRatio.getFontScale()
    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        CreateRoomContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            width: 400 * fontRatio,
            height: 250 * fontRatio,
            borderRadius: 20,
            backgroundColor: '#fff',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: height / 2 - 125,
            left: width / 2 - 200,
            zIndex: 100,
            shadowColor: '#000',
            shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: -1, },
            shadowOpacity: 0.9,
            shadowRadius: 50,
            elevation: 5,
        },
        CreateRoomTitle: {
            fontSize: 20,
            marginTop: 20,
            marginBottom: 30,
            zIndex: 100,
        },
        CreateRoomTextInput: {

        },
        DarkOverlay: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            width: width,
            height: height,
            backgroundColor: '#0b2946',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            left: 0,
            zIndex: 50,
            opacity: 0.8
        },
        CreateRoomHeader: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'row',
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItem: 'center',
            width: 400 * fontRatio,
            maxHeight: 70 * fontRatio,
            borderTopLeftRadius: 20,
            borderTopRightRadius: 20,
            backgroundColor: '#3498db'
        }

    })
    return (
        <View style={styles.DarkOverlay}>
            <View style={styles.CreateRoomContainer}>
                <View style={styles.CreateRoomHeader} >
                    <Text style={styles.CreateRoomTitle}>Create a new room</Text>
                </ View>
                <TextInput style={styles.CreateRoomTextInput} placeholder='Enter the name of the new room'></TextInput>
                <TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text>Create Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
